docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Hundreds of American employers, angry and frustrated about drug-related losses in productivity, accidents, absenteeism and surging medical expenses, have begun offering counseling programs to addicted employees in recent months in an intensified campaign against drug abuse in the workplace.

headline.main: More Aid for Addicts on the Job

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: A major New York State initiative intended to reduce Medicaid fraud has been postponed indefinitely and faces an uncertain future after suffering two legal setbacks in Manhattan courts.

headline.main: Court Postpones Medicaid Fraud Rules for New York

docs.snippet: LEAD: A major New York State initiative intended to reduce Medicaid fraud has been postponed indefinitely and faces an uncertain future after suffering two legal setbacks in Manhattan courts.
